content.content:
`.stores`

Use the **stores** resource to read and update the
shop main informations and IDs of saved documents

description.content: Store name - Max length: **255**
Simple description of store - Max length: **3000**
ID of store main segment, get options and IDs at /segments.json - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **65535**
Responsible person or organization document type
Responsible person or organization document number (only numbers) - Max length: **19** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
Municipal or state registration if exists
Municipal or state registration number (with characters) if exists - Max length: **50**
Registered company name or responsible fullname - Max length: **255**
Full registered address of company - Max length: **255**
Financial contact phone - Max length: **19** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
Name of company representative for commercial contact - Max length: **255**
Email address of company representative - Max length: **255** - Format: **email**
Public email address for news and general contact - Max length: **255** - Format: **email**
Email address to receive notifications, invoices and vouchers - Max length: **255** - Format: **email**
Image link to shop's logo
Image link - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**
Preferred sales channel domain name, with subdomain if any - Min length: **4** - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9a-z-.]+$`**
Preferred shop homepage link (full URI) - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Main colors to compose shop's visual identity
Primary color RGB code with # - RegEx pattern: **`^#[a-f0-9]{6}$`**
Secondary color RGB code with # - RegEx pattern: **`^#[a-f0-9]{6}$`**
Public contact phone - Max length: **19** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
Secondary public contact phone, commonly a cell phone number - Max length: **19** - RegEx pattern: **`^[0-9]+$`**
List of available languages on store channels - Max elements: **30**
Language two letters code, sometimes with region, eg.: `pt_br`, fr, `en_us`
Providers for OAuth customer authentication in store
Social network OAuth app
App client ID - Max length: **255**
App client secret - Max length: **255**

content.content:
*/stores/[_id].json* */stores/[store_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_: **none** Response body will follow [this model](#reference/stores/store-object), but only with public data, returning `_id`, `store_id`, `name`, `description`, `segment_id`, `contact_email`, `referral_id`, `partner_id`, `logo`, `domain`, `homepage`, `brand_colors`, `contact_phone`, `contact_cellphone` and `languages` properties

description.content: The store object ID

content.content:
*/stores/me.json* > Authentication
_GET_, _PATCH_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/stores/store-object) For editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but in this case there are no required fields

{
  "_id": "5a674f224e0dcec2c3353d9d",
  "created_at": "2017-11-19T13:10:00.612Z",
  "store_id": 100,
  "name": "Minha Loja Online",
  "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
  "segment_id": 23,
  "doc_type": "CNPJ",
  "doc_number": "12345678901234",
  "corporate_name": "Minha Loja Online LTDA",
  "address": "Rua Exemplar 100, Bairro Examplar, São Paulo, SP",
  "phone": "31988887777",
  "representant_name": "Fulano Ciclano",
  "representant_email": "fulano@sample.shop.eg",
  "contact_email": "contato@sample.shop.eg",
  "financial_email": "financeiro@sample.shop.eg",
  "logo": {
    "url": "https://sample.shop.eg/assets/logo.png",
    "size": "120x80"
  },
  "brand_colors": {
    "primary": "#03a9b3",
    "secondary": "#ffffff"
  }
}
